cta.text: Ready to transform your gem? Let's discuss your project.

equipment.name: Ultra-Tec V5
equipment.purpose: Precision faceting machine for cutting complex designs with micron-level accuracy

equipment.name: Polariscope
equipment.purpose: Optical instrument for identifying gem materials and detecting strain patterns

equipment.name: Diamond Laps
equipment.purpose: Various grit diamond-charged laps for cutting and polishing different materials

hero.subtitle: Where rough stones are transformed into brilliant gems through precision craftsmanship
hero.title: DEPLOY_SAFE_TEST_1770701490

story_timeline.body: Started with a single faceting machine and a passion for precision. What began as a hobby quickly evolved into a dedication to the craft.
story_timeline.heading: The Beginning

story_timeline.body: Expanded the workshop with professional-grade equipment. Began taking on custom cutting projects for collectors and jewelers worldwide.
story_timeline.heading: Growing the Craft

story_timeline.body: A fully equipped studio dedicated to precision gem cutting, restoration, and custom designs. Every stone tells a story, and we help bring that story to light.
story_timeline.heading: Today
